participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, Emma is passionate about her future career in law. She is hardworking and has a deep appreciation for the simplicity of rural life.
participant_1.background: i was raised on a horse farm. my family has raised horses for generations. i want to be a lawyer. i'm from a small town.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Friendly and nurturing, James has a love for teaching and enjoys sharing knowledge with others. He is grounded and finds joy in nature.
participant_2.background: i attend church every week. i have dogs. i work as a school teacher. i enjoy gardening and walking outdoors.
